Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Insensitive \In*sen"si*tive\, a. Not sensitive; wanting sensation, or wanting acute sensibility. --Tillotson. --Ruskin. [1913 Webster]

insensitive adj 1: not responsive to physical stimuli; "insensitive to radiation" [ant: {sensitive}] 2: deficient in human sensibility; not mentally or morally sensitive; "insensitive to the needs of the patients" [ant: {sensitive}]
